Section.Label: Chapter_Maps_In_Resolution_Section_Compute_maps_in_minimal_free_resolution_of_a_sheaf
Section.Heading: Compute maps in minimal free resolution of a sheaf

ManSection.Returns: a list of vector space morphisms
ManSection.Description: The arguments are a toric variety V and a f.p. graded module presentation M over the Cox ring of this variety.

ManSection.Returns: the list of induced vector space morphisms between the sheaf cohomologies of the associated vector bundles
ManSection.Description: The arguments are a toric variety V and a map of projective graded module presentation m over the Cox ring of this variety.
